title: 3.17 Quest for the Rabbis II: The Mishnah
itunes:title: Quest for the Rabbis II: The Mishnah
description: The Mishnah is the first great product of the rabbis. Traditionally it was codified around 200 CE by Rabbi Yehuda haNasi. It appears from nowhere. The Mishnah bears no resemblance to anything in the Tanakh/Old Testament, nor in the vast Jewish apocalyptic literature of preceding centuries.
